authorities here say they expect to

and then pulled him to the surface a few

with hundreds of media members from more

week the Chilean government is preparing

international spotlight yesterday a
banner with pictures of all the miners
was placed at an entrance dozens of
motor homes have taken residents here
for media crews and more parking lots

the miners get out they will be greeted

only a select few will speak to the

Sun after more than 60 days without

Alexi bottom level
in September the jobless rate remained
at nine point six percent but the
economy lost another ninety-five
thousand jobs so it seems like we're
stuck in this sort of grim new normal we
thought we had been seeing a bit of
recovery at the beginning of the year
and that seems to have flatlined why are
we kind of grinding our gears here we
have too much of everything we have to
too much into little of everything we
have too many houses we have too few
jobs too little money businesses don't

politically there's a bit of a partisan

businesses are afraid to spend it would

at this point we're even though we're

we're going to feel like we're in

the leaf is the first all-electric car

automobiles editor Jim cobb answers

did i miss this how much is this car

going on sale within the next few weeks
the cost is right around 33 thousand

from a lot of the electric cars that
have come before in
it's it's going to be available on on a

conventional compact it has four doors
it will seat theoretically five people
if two or three of them are small well

California asks I've always wondered how

does anyone know the approximate cost
nissan says that the leaf can be fully
charged at home for for less than three

about eleven cents a kilowatt hour which

now you can program the car to charge at
